description: Use Electric Bass for bass track.
title: All I Want For Christmas Is You

description:
I recreated all the bass lines following the official video clip. In the final, only one note will need a five-string bass.

I couldn't fix other instruments' parts, as I don't know, but you will see a difference between the tab, the bass, and the video clip. If you can fix it, please do so.
title: All I Want For Christmas Is You
